name: Earthnet
description: Earthnet is a privately owned, boutique-style, data center and managed services provider, specializing in enterprise level, secure cloud solutions and IT services. Founded in 1994 by Boulder residents, Bahman Saless and Chesley McColl, Earthnet addressed Boulder’s need for an evolving, client centric data center.We pride ourselves in custom made solutions for small to medium size businesses that can benefit from the features of a tier 3 data center.
